headline: Manchester's Most Trusted
Tattoo Studio
hero.subheadline: Located in the iconic Old Bank Building on Chapel Street, we've earned 82 five-star reviews through exceptional artistry and uncompromising quality.
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist working in the historic Old Bank Building studio

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece tells a story, crafted with precision in Manchester's most distinctive studio space.

sessions.subtitle: Professional consultations and custom work in our Chapel Street studio
sessions.guarantee: All work guaranteed with free touch-ups within 6 months

testimonials.quote: Absolutely brilliant work from the team at TOB. The Old Bank location is stunning and the artists really know their stuff. Couldn't be happier with my piece.
testimonials.author: Marcus T.

testimonials.quote: Been to quite a few studios around Manchester but TOB is something special. Clean, professional, and the artwork speaks for itself. Already planning my next one!
testimonials.author: Kelly R.

testimonials.quote: Great experience from start to finish. The historic building adds such character and the artists are top notch. Highly recommend for anyone in the area.
testimonials.author: James M.

paragraphs: Housed in one of Salford's most striking architectural gems, Tattoos at TOB brings together Manchester's rich industrial heritage with cutting-edge tattoo artistry. The Old Bank Building on Chapel Street isn't just our address – it's part of our identity, lending gravitas and character to every session.

Our team of artists has built an unshakeable reputation through word-of-mouth and genuine skill. With 82 five-star Google reviews, we've proven that quality work and honest service still matter. We welcome both walk-ins looking for flash pieces and clients seeking custom designs that'll stand the test of time.
about.callout: Every tattoo deserves the perfect setting – and ours happens to be a piece of Manchester history.
about.imageAlt: Tattoo artist working in the historic Old Bank Building studio space

items.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome walk-ins daily from 11am onwards. We keep a selection of flash designs ready to go, and if you're after something custom, we can usually get you booked in within the week.

items.question: What's your deposit policy?
items.answer: We ask for a £50 deposit on custom work to secure your slot and cover design time. This comes off your final bill, and we only charge it once we've confirmed your appointment date.

items.question: How do I know if my tattoo idea will work?
items.answer: Bring in your ideas – photos, sketches, whatever you've got – and we'll give you honest feedback. Some concepts need tweaking to work well as tattoos, and we'd rather tell you upfront than deliver something you're not thrilled with.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Get Inked?
finalCta.subheadline: Join the 82 clients who've given us five stars. Book your consultation today.

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss availability and pricing.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for choosing Tattoos at TOB. We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit may be required for custom work
